hero.title: ProFit — Train smarter, grow stronger

product.title: Product & Services
product.subtitle: Programs, tracking, and guided workouts with video demos.

download.title: Download for Android

home.featureFormDesc: Short tips to keep technique sharp.

productPage.programsDesc: Follow structured routines tailored to your goals with clear guidance.
productPage.insightsDesc: See which muscle groups you train most and balance your routine.
productPage.formDesc: Short video demos help you nail form and stay safe during lifts.

contactPage.emailDesc: We aim to reply within 1–2 business days.
contactPage.telegramNote: Fast responses from the team and community.
contactPage.faq1Q: How do I install the APK?
contactPage.faq1A: Download the APK on your Android device, open it, and allow installs from your browser if prompted.
contactPage.faq2A: We’re focusing on Android first. iOS support is planned.
contactPage.faq3Q: How do I report a bug?
contactPage.faq3A: Email us with steps to reproduce, your device model, and screenshots if possible.

pricingPage.starterDesc: Great for getting started with tracking.
pricingPage.proDesc: Unlock everything and save more annually.
